en_results_raw: that she looked even more beautiful than he had remembered, her long hair tied up in a ponytail and a hint of a smile playing on her lips. He couldn't help but feel a flutter in his chest as she walked towards him, her eyes fixed on his. She seemed to be searching for something, but he wasn't sure what. He stood up straight, trying to appear calm, but his heart was racing with anticipation. As she reached the bottom of the stairs, she finally spoke, breaking the silence that had fallen between them. "Hey, I'm glad I caught you," she said, her voice soft and gentle. "I was starting to think you'd be out," she added, a hint of amusement in her voice. Bruno smiled, feeling a sense of relief wash over him, and replied, "I was just waiting for you." He paused for a moment, collecting his thoughts before continuing, "I was thinking we could talk about what's been going on. I feel like we haven't had a chance to really discuss everything that's been happening." She nodded, her eyes never leaving his, and took a step closer, her movements fluid and confident. "I was thinking the same thing," she said, her voice barely above a whisper. "I feel like we've been dancing around things for too long." Bruno's heart skipped a beat as he realized she was right. They had been avoiding the elephant in the room for far too long, and it was time to face it head-on. He took a deep breath, steeling himself for the conversation that was about to unfold.

en_first_half: On most days the young lieutenant looked very smart, striding around in a uniform that appeared to have been ironed while he was wearing it. His black boots always sparkled with polish and his yellow-blond hair was parted at the side and held perfectly in place with something
en_second_half: that made all the comb marks stand out in it, like a field that had just been tilled. Also he wore so much cologne that you could smell him coming from quite a distance. Bruno had learned not to stand downwind of him or he would risk fainting away.
en_results: The young lieutenant's uniform was immaculate, a testament to the precision and attention to detail that seemed to be a hallmark of his personality. His black boots, polished to a mirror finish, clicked smartly on the polished floor as he moved with
en_results_raw: The young lieutenant's uniform was immaculate, a testament to the precision and attention to detail that seemed to be a hallmark of his personality. His black boots, polished to a mirror finish, clicked smartly on the polished floor as he moved with a confident air, his yellow-blond hair still perfectly in place thanks to the discreet hairpin that held it back from his forehead. As he walked, his eyes scanned the room with a sense of purpose, taking in every detail with a practiced eye. His gaze lingered on the rows of neatly arranged files on the nearby desk, the precision-crafted clock on the wall, and the spotless floor, all of which seemed to reflect the lieutenant's own sense of order and discipline. Despite his youthful appearance, there was an air of authority about him that commanded respect, and his fellow officers seemed to regard him with a mixture of admiration and wariness. As he moved through the room, he seemed to be a man on a mission, driven by a sense of duty and a desire to prove himself. His eyes, a bright blue that seemed to sparkle with intensity, gleamed with a sense of purpose, and his jaw was set in a firm line, as if he was determined to overcome any obstacle that came his way. The lieutenant's very presence seemed to command attention, and as he moved through the room, a sense of anticipation seemed to build, as if everyone was waiting to see what he would do next. His voice, deep and confident, rang out as he addressed his fellow officers, and they listened with rapt attention, hanging on his every word. The young lieutenant was a man on the rise, and it seemed that nothing was going to stand in his way.

es_results_raw: perfeccionado, lo que le daba un aspecto de un verdadero caballero. 'I have been sent to this place for one reason, and one reason only: to bring about a change. A change that will shake the very foundations of this town, and leave it forever altered. The people of this town have grown complacent, stagnant, and it is time for a wake-up call. I am that call, and I will not be ignored.' He paused, his chest heaving with intensity, as the group exchanged nervous glances, sensing the weight of his words. The air was thick with tension, and it seemed as though the very fate of the town hung in the balance, as Herr Liszt's eyes seemed to bore into the souls of those around him, searching for any sign of resistance or dissent. But to his surprise, no one spoke out against him, and instead, a murmur of anticipation began to spread through the crowd, as if they were all waiting with bated breath for the chaos that was to come.

es_first_half: Cuando llevaba casi una hora andando y empezó a tener hambre, pensó que quizá ya había explorado suficiente por aquel día y que debería volver. Sin embargo, en ese preciso instante apareció a lo lejos un puntito, y Bruno entrecerró los ojos para distinguir qué era. Recordó un libro que había leído, en el
es_second_half: que un hombre se perdía en el desierto y, como llevaba varios días sin comer ni beber nada, imaginaba que veía fabulosos restaurantes y enormes fuentes, pero cuando intentaba comer o beber en ellos éstos desaparecían y sólo encontraba puñados de arena. Se preguntó si sería aquello lo que le estaba pasando a él.
es_results: output>leído, en el que se describía un pequeño pueblo escondido en el bosque, rodeado de árboles altos y verdes, con una iglesia en el centro y un río cristalino que fluía suavemente a su lado. La imagen le vino a la mente con tanta claridad que se preguntó si podría ser ese el lugar que había visto en su sueño.
es_results_raw: <output>leído, en el que se describía un pequeño pueblo escondido en el bosque, rodeado de árboles altos y verdes, con una iglesia en el centro y un río cristalino que fluía suavemente a su lado. La imagen le vino a la mente con tanta claridad que se preguntó si podría ser ese el lugar que había visto en su sueño. Se dirigió hacia el punto que había visto, y a medida que se acercaba, comenzó a sentir una sensación extraña, como si estuviera siendo atraído hacia allí. El puntito se convirtió en una figura humana, que se movía con una lentitud extraña, como si estuviera caminando en el agua. Bruno se detuvo en seco, con la boca seca y el corazón latiendo con fuerza, y se preguntó qué sería lo que estaba a punto de encontrar. El aire se había vuelto pesado y silencioso, como si el bosque mismo estuviera esperando a que tomara la decisión de seguir adelante o regresar a casa. La figura humana se acercó, y Bruno pudo ver que era una mujer, con una capa oscura que le cubría el cuerpo y un sombrero que le tapaba la cara. Se detuvo frente a él, y por un momento, no se movió ni habló. Luego, en un susurro, dijo: "¿Qué buscas, joven?" Bruno se sorprendió al escuchar su voz, que era como un susurro de hojas secas. No sabía qué responder, así que simplemente se limitó a mirarla fijamente, tratando de comprender qué era lo que estaba pasando. La mujer parecía esperar una respuesta, pero Bruno no sabía qué decir. Finalmente, después de lo que pareció una eternidad, habló: "Estoy buscando algo", dijo, sin saber qué era exactamente lo que buscaba. en_results_raw: The boy was smaller than Bruno and was sitting on the ground with a forlorn expression. He wore the same striped pyjamas that all the other people on that side of the fence had been wearing since the Great Sleepover, a tradition that had been passed down for generations. The boy's eyes were fixed on the fence, his gaze drifting towards the other side where the adults were laughing and chatting, their bright, colorful clothes a stark contrast to the dull, monotonous attire of the children. He let out a deep sigh, his chest rising and falling with a mix of longing and sadness. The boy's name was Timmy, and he had been separated from his family for what felt like an eternity. He had lost count of the days, but he knew it had been at least a week since he had last seen his mother's warm smile or his father's comforting words. The fence loomed above him, a constant reminder of the divide between the two worlds. Timmy's thoughts were interrupted by the sound of footsteps, and he looked up to see a figure approaching him. It was a girl, slightly taller than him, with a messy bob of curly brown hair and a bright blue dress that seemed to glow in the fading light of day. She looked just as lost as he was, and Timmy's heart skipped a beat as she sat down beside him, her eyes locked on the fence with a look of determination.

en_first_half: Bruno was of the opinion that when it came to parents, and
en_second_half: especially when it came to sisters, what they didn’t know couldn’t hurt them.
en_results: their children's education, they should be more involved and supportive, rather
en_results_raw: their children's education, they should be more involved and supportive, rather than just being a figure of authority. Many parents often struggle to find the right balance between being overly protective and giving their children the freedom to make their own decisions. This can lead to feelings of resentment and rebellion in children, as they feel that their parents are not taking their opinions into account. On the other hand, some parents may be too lenient, which can result in children making poor choices and not learning from their mistakes. Therefore, it is essential for parents to strike a balance between being supportive and giving their children the autonomy they need to grow and develop into independent individuals. By doing so, they can foster a positive and healthy relationship with their children, which will benefit both parties in the long run. This can be achieved by having open and honest communication, setting clear boundaries, and being consistent in their approach to discipline and punishment. By taking the time to understand their children's needs and concerns, parents can provide them with the guidance and support they require to navigate the challenges of growing up, while also giving them the freedom to make their own choices and learn from their mistakes. This delicate balance is crucial in helping children develop into confident, capable, and responsible individuals who are equipped to handle the ups and downs of life.

es_results_raw: en Rusia, donde creció en un pequeño pueblo al norte del país, rodeado de bosques y lagos cristalinos. Su infancia fue marcada por la pobreza y la soledad, pero también por una gran curiosidad y una pasión por la naturaleza. Pavel siempre se sintió atraído por los secretos del bosque, y pasaba horas explorándolo, descubriendo nuevos senderos y especies de plantas y animales que solo él conocía. Su madre, una mujer fuerte y sabia, le enseñó a respetar la naturaleza y a vivir en armonía con el entorno. A medida que Pavel crecía, su interés por la naturaleza se convirtió en una pasión, y comenzó a dedicar cada vez más tiempo a explorar y estudiar el bosque, descubriendo secretos que pocos otros conocían.

He landed on a small, dusty vase on the nightstand, and for a moment, he considered making a break for it, hoping to escape the conversation altogether. But he knew that wouldn't be wise, so he took a deep breath and tried to focus on the task at hand. He began to explain, in a hesitant tone, that he had indeed been at the library that night, studying for an exam, and had stumbled upon the mysterious object by chance. He claimed to have picked it up, intending to return it to its rightful owner, but had gotten lost in thought and forgotten all about it until now. He hoped that his story would be believable, but he couldn't shake the feeling that he was being watched, and that his sister was not buying what he was selling. She raised an eyebrow, clearly unconvinced, and asked him to continue, her voice firm but controlled. He swallowed hard, knowing that he had to think fast if he wanted to get out of this situation without getting in trouble. He took another deep breath, trying to gather his thoughts, and began to elaborate on his story, hoping to convince her that he was telling the truth. But as he spoke, he couldn't help but feel a sense of unease, as if he was trapped in a web of lies, and that it was only a matter of time before he got caught.

en_results_raw: consider the inconvenience of having to walk back to the village to buy a bag, especially since they were already running late for the festival. He looked around and spotted a large, old-fashioned trunk leaning against the wall of a nearby building. It was dusty and looked like it hadn't been used in years, but it might do in a pinch. Bruno picked it up and examined it more closely, checking for any signs of damage or decay. The wood was worn and weathered, but it seemed sturdy enough to hold his clothes. He opened it and found it to be surprisingly roomy, with a musty smell that hinted at its age. He began to gather his belongings and stuff them into the trunk, trying to make the most of the space available. As he worked, he couldn't help but wonder who might have owned this trunk in the past, and what kind of stories it might hold. The trunk seemed to have a history, and Bruno felt a pang of excitement at the thought of uncovering its secrets. He finished packing and closed the trunk, feeling a sense of satisfaction at having found a solution to his problem. Now, he just had to get to the festival on time, and hope that the music and dancing would be worth the trouble he'd gone to. The sun was high overhead, casting a warm glow over the scene, and Bruno felt a sense of anticipation building inside him. He took a deep breath, shouldered the trunk, and set off towards the festival grounds, ready to immerse himself in the sights and sounds of the celebration.

Mientras tanto, se quedó quieto en el medio de la calle, con la cabeza descubierta y la ropa empapada, sintiendo el agua fría que se filtraba por su cabello y su ropa. Se quedó mirando el vehículo que se alejaba, sintiendo una sensación de frustración y desamparo. Justo cuando estaba a punto de darse la vuelta y seguir su camino, escuchó el sonido de otro coche que se acercaba. Esta vez, el conductor se detuvo a su lado y bajó la ventanilla para preguntarle si necesitaba ayuda. Bruno se sintió aliviado y agradecido, y le explicó su situación. El conductor, un hombre amable y de aspecto agradable, le ofreció llevarlo a su destino, y Bruno aceptó con gusto. Mientras se subía al coche, se dio cuenta de que la lluvia había amainado un poco, pero la noche estaba aún oscura y lluviosa. Se sentó en el asiento del pasajero, agradecido por la ayuda, y se preguntó qué le depararía el resto de la noche.

en_results_raw: seemed like a simple task, but as he began to walk through the shallow water, he felt the cold seeping into his skin, making his toes curl in discomfort. The water was icy, and he could see his breath misting in the chilly air. He had been warned about the river's temperature, but he hadn't expected it to be this cold. As he continued on, the water rose higher up his legs, and he could feel the chill spreading up his body. He quickened his pace, trying to get to the other side as soon as possible, but the water seemed to be getting deeper by the second. The current was stronger than he had anticipated, and he stumbled, almost losing his balance. He regained his footing and pressed on, his teeth chattering from the cold. The trees on the other side of the river seemed to be getting closer, but they seemed to be moving away from him at the same time, their branches swaying ominously in the wind. He was starting to feel a sense of unease, and he wondered if he had made a mistake by coming here. The water was up to his waist now, and he was starting to feel the weight of it, making every step feel like a struggle. He looked up at the sky, hoping to see some sign of a break in the clouds, but the grey sky seemed to stretch on forever, with no end in sight. The wind was picking up, and the trees were creaking and swaying, making him feel even more uneasy. He took a deep breath and tried to focus on his goal, but his mind kept wandering back to the doubts that had been plaguing him since he started this journey. Was he really doing the right thing? Was he prepared for what lay ahead? The questions swirled in his mind as he trudged on, the water continuing to rise, the cold seeping deeper into his bones.

es_first_half: No tardaron mucho en llegar a donde iban. Bruno abrió bien los ojos, dispuesto a maravillarse ante las cosas que vería. Había imaginado que en las cabañas vivían familias felices, algunas de las cuales, al anochecer, se sentarían fuera en mecedoras para contarse historias y comentar que todo era mejor
es_second_half: antes, cuando ellos eran pequeños y tenían respeto por sus mayores, no como los niños de hoy en día. Pensaba que todos los niños y niñas que vivían allí estarían en diferentes grupos, jugando al tenis o al fútbol, brincando o trazando cuadrados en el suelo para jugar al tejo.
es_results: que en la ciudad, pero pronto se dio cuenta de que la realidad era muy diferente. Las cabañas parecían abandonadas, con ventanas rotas y puertas que colgaban de sus goznes. El viento soplaba con fuerza, haciendo que las ramas de los árboles se balancearan como si estuvieran bailando.
es_results_raw: que en la ciudad, pero pronto se dio cuenta de que la realidad era muy diferente. Las cabañas parecían abandonadas, con ventanas rotas y puertas que colgaban de sus goznes. El viento soplaba con fuerza, haciendo que las ramas de los árboles se balancearan como si estuvieran bailando. Bruno se sintió un escalofrío recorrer su espina dorsal al ver la oscuridad que se cernía sobre el lugar. De repente, escuchó un ruido extraño, como si alguien estuviera caminando por el bosque, pero no podía ver a nadie. Se preguntó si estaría solo en el mundo, rodeado de un silencio que parecía haber sido roto por su presencia. La luna comenzó a asomar detrás de las nubes, iluminando el paisaje con una luz tenue y misteriosa. Las sombras se estiraban y se contorsionaban en todas direcciones, como si fueran serpientes que se despertaran de un largo sueño. Bruno se sintió atraído por la curiosidad, y decidió seguir el ruido, que parecía provenir de una de las cabañas más cercanas. Al acercarse, escuchó una voz susurrante, que parecía provenir de dentro de la casa. La voz decía algo que no podía entender, pero que parecía ser una canción, una canción que parecía llamarlo, invitarlo a entrar y descubrir lo que había dentro. La curiosidad se apoderó de él, y sin dudarlo, empujó la puerta y entró en la cabaña.

tr_results_raw: olduğunu hayal ederdi. Şimdi ise, bu barakalar boştu ve sessizlik, bir anda tüm sevinçten ve mutluluktan daha güçlüydü. Bruno, bir an için durdu ve etrafına bakındı. Hiçbir ses yoktu, sadece birilerinin geçmişte yaşadıkları anılar ve sevinçler vardı. O anda, Bruno'nun aklına, çocukken duyduğu hikâyeler gelmeye başladı. Babası, annesi ve kardeşleri, hep birlikte, bir barakada, bir ateşin etrafında, birbirlerine sarılmış, sevinçli ve mutluluklıydılar. Bu anılar, Bruno'nun gözlerinde yaşlar oluşturdu ve bir an için, geçmişe döndüğü için mutluluk duydu.
